Date: Tue, 19 Feb 2008 05:03:47 -0800 (PST)
From: Setya <jsetya@gmail.com>
Subject: Exception when parsing excel file

File from Crystal Reports will blow up with an ArrayIndexOutOfBounds when
creating the StyleRecord. It seems Crystal Reports didn't read the excel spec
from Microsoft properly
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
